jobTitle: Staff Nurse II - L&D; (night St Luke Campus) - PD

companyInfo.Competitors: Kaiser Permanente, UC Davis Health System, Dignity Health

jobDescription: Description Job Summary: Responsible for providing direct patient care to specific patient populations effectively using the nursing process - Assessment, Planning, Implementation & Continual Reassessment - as the foundation for care delivery. Serves as a patient advocate; effectively coordinates care and continually promotes safety and clinical / service quality in daily practice judgment/knowledge/skills. Qualifications Qualifications: Associate's degree in Nursing required. BSN preferred. AHA BLS/ CPR and NRP certification required. Current California RN license required. Minimum level of experience: 1-3 years L&D;, Mom Baby experience within the last 5 years required.
